[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@keymanapp/kmc-kmn](./kmc-kmn.md) &gt; [KmnCompilerMessages](./kmc-kmn.kmncompilermessages.md)

## KmnCompilerMessages class

This class defines messages from kmcmplib. They should correspond to codes in kmn\_compiler\_errors.h, exclusive severity bits. For example:

```
  kmcmplib.CERR_BadCallParams = CERR_FATAL | 0x002 = 0x8002
  ERROR_BadCallParams = SevError | 0x0002 = 0x300000 | 0x2000 | 0x002 = 0x302002
```
CERR\_ messages that are actually fatals have been renamed to FATAL\_.

Message text is defined by kmcmplib and passed through a callback.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class KmnCompilerMessages 
```
